short_summary: A procurement notice for the requirements for an industrial multi-use shredder from the Department of National Defence  (DND)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2029,12,09 by 12:00 pm. All bids submitted after 12:00 pm will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
tags: distrust, application deployment, post severance total
